TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrowAnnotation extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation

remarks.format:
## Remarks Arrow annotations can be used to connect to points on the chart or to highlight a single chart area.
Different arrow styles and sizes can be applied to the annotation.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The annotation must be anchored using either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
Its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the annotation type. For internal use, should not be used.
Docs.value: A value that represents the name of the annotation type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Gets the name of each annotation type such as Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
